    "# Interactive Image Processing Application\n",
    "\n",
    "This notebook guides you through building an interactive image processing application using OpenCV, Matplotlib, and ipywidgets. You will create a user interface with controls to manipulate images and visualize the results."

    "# Import necessary libraries\n",
    "import cv2\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "from matplotlib import pyplot as plt\n",
    "import ipywidgets as widgets\n",
    "from IPython.display import display\n",
    "import os\n",
    "\n",
    "# Initialize global variables\n",
    "original_bgr, original_rgb, processed_rgb = None, None, None\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create output directories\n",
    "output_path = './outputs/'\n",
    "os.makedirs(output_path, exist_ok=True)\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create widget output areas\n",
    "msg_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "img_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "hist_out = widgets.Output()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:05.226090Z",
     "iopub.status.busy": "2026-02-28T18:05:05.225724Z",
     "iopub.status.idle": "2026-02-28T18:05:05.229675Z",
     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:05.229150Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb):\n",
    "    with img_out:\n",
    "        img_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        fig, axes = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(10, 5))\n",
    "        axes[0].imshow(original_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[0].set_title('Original Image')\n",
    "        axes[1].imshow(processed_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[1].set_title('Processed Image')\n",
    "        for ax in axes:\n",
    "            ax.axis('off')\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:05.231862Z",
     "iopub.status.busy": "2026-02-28T18:05:05.231699Z",
     "iopub.status.idle": "2026-02-28T18:05:05.235042Z",
     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:05.234500Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def show_histogram(processed_rgb):\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(processed_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    hist = cv2.calcHist([gray], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])\n",
    "    with hist_out:\n",
    "        hist_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        plt.figure(figsize=(5, 3))\n",
    "        plt.title('Histogram')\n",
    "        plt.plot(hist, color='black')\n",
    "        plt.xlim([0, 256])\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Callback Functions\n",
    "Implement the callback functions for each control."
   ]
  },

   "cell_type": "code",

    "execution": {

   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_browse_image_clicked(b):\n",
    "    from google.colab import files\n",
    "    uploaded = files.upload()\n",
    "    for filename in uploaded.keys():\n",
    "        original_bgr = cv2.imread(filename)\n",
    "        if original_bgr is not None:\n",
    "            global original_rgb, processed_rgb\n",
    "            original_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(original_bgr, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB)\n",
    "            processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "            show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "            with msg_out:\n",
    "                msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "                print(f'Loaded image: {filename}')\n"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "def on_grayscale_clicked(b):\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(original_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(gray, cv2.COLOR_GRAY2RGB)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "def on_brightness_change(change):\n",
    "    value = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.convertScaleAbs(original_rgb, alpha=1, beta=value)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "def on_resize_change(change):\n",
    "    scale = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    width = int(original_rgb.shape[1] * scale)\n",
    "    height = int(original_rgb.shape[0] * scale)\n",
    "    dim = (width, height)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.resize(original_rgb, dim, interpolation=cv2.INTER_AREA)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "    with msg_out:\n",
    "        msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "        print(f'Resized to: {processed_rgb.shape[1]}x{processed_rgb.shape[0]}')\n"
   ]
  },

   "cell_type": "code",

     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:05.258208Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_rotation_change(change):\n",
    "    angle = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    if angle == 90:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_CLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    elif angle == 180:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_180)\n",
    "    elif angle == 270:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_COUNTERCLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    else:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]
  },

    "def on_save_image_clicked(b):\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    output_filename = os.path.join(output_path, 'processed_image.jpg')\n",
    "    processed_bgr = cv2.cvtColor(processed_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2BGR)\n",
    "    cv2.imwrite(output_filename, processed_bgr)\n",
    "    with msg_out:\n",
    "        msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "        print(f'Saved image to: {output_filename}')\n"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "browse_button = widgets.Button(description='Browse Image')\n",
    "grayscale_button = widgets.Button(description='Convert to Grayscale')\n",
    "brightness_slider = widgets.IntSlider(description='Brightness', min=-100, max=100, value=0)\n",
    "resize_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Resize', options=[1.0, 0.75, 0.5], value=1.0)\n",
    "rotation_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Rotation', options=[0, 90, 180, 270], value=0)\n",
    "plot_histogram_button = widgets.Button(description='Plot Histogram')\n",
    "save_button = widgets.Button(description='Save Image')\n",
    "\n",
    "browse_button.on_click(on_browse_image_clicked)\n",
    "grayscale_button.on_click(on_grayscale_clicked)\n",
    "brightness_slider.observe(on_brightness_change, names='value')\n",
    "resize_dropdown.observe(on_resize_change, names='value')\n",
    "rotation_dropdown.observe(on_rotation_change, names='value')\n",
    "plot_histogram_button.on_click(on_plot_histogram_clicked)\n",
    "save_button.on_click(on_save_image_clicked)\n",
    "\n",
    "controls = widgets.VBox([browse_button, grayscale_button, brightness_slider, resize_dropdown, rotation_dropdown, plot_histogram_button, save_button])\n",
    "right_side = widgets.VBox([img_out, hist_out])\n",
    "ui = widgets.HBox([controls, right_side])\n",
    "\n",
    "display(msg_out, ui)\n",
    "with msg_out:\n",
    "    print('Please click Browse Image to start.')\n"
   ]
  }
 ],

    "# Import necessary libraries\n",
    "import cv2\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "from matplotlib import pyplot as plt\n",
    "import ipywidgets as widgets\n",
    "from IPython.display import display\n",
    "import os\n",
    "\n",
    "# Initialize global variables\n",
    "original_bgr, original_rgb, processed_rgb = None, None, None\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create output directories\n",
    "output_path = './outputs/'\n",
    "os.makedirs(output_path, exist_ok=True)\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create widget output areas\n",
    "msg_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "img_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "hist_out = widgets.Output()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {

   "source": [
    "def show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb):\n",
    "    with img_out:\n",
    "        img_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        fig, axes = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(10, 5))\n",
    "        axes[0].imshow(original_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[0].set_title('Original Image')\n",
    "        axes[1].imshow(processed_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[1].set_title('Processed Image')\n",
    "        for ax in axes:\n",
    "            ax.axis('off')\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",

    "def show_histogram(processed_rgb):\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(processed_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    hist = cv2.calcHist([gray], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])\n",
    "    with hist_out:\n",
    "        hist_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        plt.figure(figsize=(5, 3))\n",
    "        plt.title('Histogram')\n",
    "        plt.plot(hist, color='black')\n",
    "        plt.xlim([0, 256])\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "def on_browse_image_clicked(b):\n",
    "    from google.colab import files\n",
    "    uploaded = files.upload()\n",
    "    for filename in uploaded.keys():\n",
    "        original_bgr = cv2.imread(filename)\n",
    "        if original_bgr is not None:\n",
    "            global original_rgb, processed_rgb\n",
    "            original_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(original_bgr, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB)\n",
    "            processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "            show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "            with msg_out:\n",
    "                msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "                print(f'Loaded image: {filename}')\n"
   ]

    "def on_grayscale_clicked(b):\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(original_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(gray, cv2.COLOR_GRAY2RGB)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"

    "def on_brightness_change(change):\n",
    "    value = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.convertScaleAbs(original_rgb, alpha=1, beta=value)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]

    "def on_resize_change(change):\n",
    "    scale = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    width = int(original_rgb.shape[1] * scale)\n",
    "    height = int(original_rgb.shape[0] * scale)\n",
    "    dim = (width, height)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.resize(original_rgb, dim, interpolation=cv2.INTER_AREA)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "    with msg_out:\n",
    "        msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "        print(f'Resized to: {processed_rgb.shape[1]}x{processed_rgb.shape[0]}')\n"
   ]

   "source": [
    "def on_rotation_change(change):\n",
    "    angle = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    if angle == 90:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_CLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    elif angle == 180:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_180)\n",
    "    elif angle == 270:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_COUNTERCLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    else:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"

    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    output_filename = os.path.join(output_path, 'processed_image.jpg')\n",
    "    processed_bgr = cv2.cvtColor(processed_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2BGR)\n",

    "browse_button = widgets.Button(description='Browse Image')\n",
    "grayscale_button = widgets.Button(description='Convert to Grayscale')\n",
    "brightness_slider = widgets.IntSlider(description='Brightness', min=-100, max=100, value=0)\n",
    "resize_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Resize', options=[1.0, 0.75, 0.5], value=1.0)\n",
    "rotation_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Rotation', options=[0, 90, 180, 270], value=0)\n",
    "plot_histogram_button = widgets.Button(description='Plot Histogram')\n",
    "save_button = widgets.Button(description='Save Image')\n",
    "\n",
    "browse_button.on_click(on_browse_image_clicked)\n",
    "grayscale_button.on_click(on_grayscale_clicked)\n",
    "brightness_slider.observe(on_brightness_change, names='value')\n",
    "resize_dropdown.observe(on_resize_change, names='value')\n",
    "rotation_dropdown.observe(on_rotation_change, names='value')\n",
    "plot_histogram_button.on_click(on_plot_histogram_clicked)\n",
    "save_button.on_click(on_save_image_clicked)\n",
    "\n",
    "controls = widgets.VBox([browse_button, grayscale_button, brightness_slider, resize_dropdown, rotation_dropdown, plot_histogram_button, save_button])\n",
    "right_side = widgets.VBox([img_out, hist_out])\n",
    "ui = widgets.HBox([controls, right_side])\n",
    "\n",
    "display(msg_out, ui)\n",
    "with msg_out:\n",
    "    print('Please click Browse Image to start.')\n"
   ]
  }

    "# Import necessary libraries\n",
    "import cv2\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "from matplotlib import pyplot as plt\n",
    "import ipywidgets as widgets\n",
    "from IPython.display import display\n",
    "import os\n",
    "\n",
    "# Initialize global variables\n",
    "original_bgr, original_rgb, processed_rgb = None, None, None\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create output directories\n",
    "output_path = './outputs/'\n",
    "os.makedirs(output_path, exist_ok=True)\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create widget output areas\n",
    "msg_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "img_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "hist_out = widgets.Output()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:14.208270Z",

    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb):\n",
    "    with img_out:\n",
    "        img_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        fig, axes = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(10, 5))\n",
    "        axes[0].imshow(original_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[0].set_title('Original Image')\n",
    "        axes[1].imshow(processed_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[1].set_title('Processed Image')\n",
    "        for ax in axes:\n",
    "            ax.axis('off')\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",

   "source": [
    "def show_histogram(processed_rgb):\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(processed_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    hist = cv2.calcHist([gray], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])\n",
    "    with hist_out:\n",
    "        hist_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        plt.figure(figsize=(5, 3))\n",
    "        plt.title('Histogram')\n",
    "        plt.plot(hist, color='black')\n",
    "        plt.xlim([0, 256])\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },

    "def on_browse_image_clicked(b):\n",
    "    from google.colab import files\n",
    "    uploaded = files.upload()\n",
    "    for filename in uploaded.keys():\n",
    "        original_bgr = cv2.imread(filename)\n",
    "        if original_bgr is not None:\n",
    "            global original_rgb, processed_rgb\n",
    "            original_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(original_bgr, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB)\n",
    "            processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "            show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "            with msg_out:\n",
    "                msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "                print(f'Loaded image: {filename}')\n"
   ]

    "def on_resize_change(change):\n",
    "    scale = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    width = int(original_rgb.shape[1] * scale)\n",
    "    height = int(original_rgb.shape[0] * scale)\n",
    "    dim = (width, height)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.resize(original_rgb, dim, interpolation=cv2.INTER_AREA)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "    with msg_out:\n",

    "def on_rotation_change(change):\n",
    "    angle = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    if angle == 90:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_CLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    elif angle == 180:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_180)\n",
    "    elif angle == 270:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_COUNTERCLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    else:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"

    "def on_save_image_clicked(b):\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    output_filename = os.path.join(output_path, 'processed_image.jpg')\n",
    "    processed_bgr = cv2.cvtColor(processed_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2BGR)\n",
    "    cv2.imwrite(output_filename, processed_bgr)\n",
    "    with msg_out:\n",
    "        msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "        print(f'Saved image to: {output_filename}')\n"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "browse_button = widgets.Button(description='Browse Image')\n",
    "grayscale_button = widgets.Button(description='Convert to Grayscale')\n",
    "brightness_slider = widgets.IntSlider(description='Brightness', min=-100, max=100, value=0)\n",
    "resize_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Resize', options=[1.0, 0.75, 0.5], value=1.0)\n",
    "rotation_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Rotation', options=[0, 90, 180, 270], value=0)\n",
    "plot_histogram_button = widgets.Button(description='Plot Histogram')\n",
    "save_button = widgets.Button(description='Save Image')\n",
    "\n",
    "browse_button.on_click(on_browse_image_clicked)\n",
    "grayscale_button.on_click(on_grayscale_clicked)\n",
    "brightness_slider.observe(on_brightness_change, names='value')\n",
    "resize_dropdown.observe(on_resize_change, names='value')\n",
    "rotation_dropdown.observe(on_rotation_change, names='value')\n",
    "plot_histogram_button.on_click(on_plot_histogram_clicked)\n",
    "save_button.on_click(on_save_image_clicked)\n",
    "\n",
    "controls = widgets.VBox([browse_button, grayscale_button, brightness_slider, resize_dropdown, rotation_dropdown, plot_histogram_button, save_button])\n",
    "right_side = widgets.VBox([img_out, hist_out])\n",
    "ui = widgets.HBox([controls, right_side])\n",
    "\n",
    "display(msg_out, ui)\n",
    "with msg_out:\n",
    "    print('Please click Browse Image to start.')\n"
   ]
  }
 ],

    "# Import necessary libraries\n",
    "import cv2\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "from matplotlib import pyplot as plt\n",
    "import ipywidgets as widgets\n",
    "from IPython.display import display\n",
    "import os\n",
    "\n",
    "# Initialize global variables\n",
    "original_bgr, original_rgb, processed_rgb = None, None, None\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create output directories\n",
    "output_path = './outputs/'\n",
    "os.makedirs(output_path, exist_ok=True)\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create widget output areas\n",
    "msg_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "img_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "hist_out = widgets.Output()\n"
   ]
  },

    "def show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb):\n",
    "    with img_out:\n",
    "        img_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        fig, axes = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(10, 5))\n",
    "        axes[0].imshow(original_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[0].set_title('Original Image')\n",
    "        axes[1].imshow(processed_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[1].set_title('Processed Image')\n",
    "        for ax in axes:\n",
    "            ax.axis('off')\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]

   "source": [
    "def show_histogram(processed_rgb):\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(processed_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    hist = cv2.calcHist([gray], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])\n",
    "    with hist_out:\n",
    "        hist_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        plt.figure(figsize=(5, 3))\n",
    "        plt.title('Histogram')\n",
    "        plt.plot(hist, color='black')\n",
    "        plt.xlim([0, 256])\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "def on_browse_image_clicked(b):\n",
    "    from google.colab import files\n",
    "    uploaded = files.upload()\n",
    "    for filename in uploaded.keys():\n",
    "        original_bgr = cv2.imread(filename)\n",
    "        if original_bgr is not None:\n",
    "            global original_rgb, processed_rgb\n",
    "            original_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(original_bgr, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB)\n",
    "            processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "            show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "            with msg_out:\n",
    "                msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "                print(f'Loaded image: {filename}')\n"
   ]
  },

   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_grayscale_clicked(b):\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(original_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(gray, cv2.COLOR_GRAY2RGB)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]

   "source": [
    "def on_brightness_change(change):\n",
    "    value = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.convertScaleAbs(original_rgb, alpha=1, beta=value)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]
  },

    "def on_resize_change(change):\n",
    "    scale = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    width = int(original_rgb.shape[1] * scale)\n",
    "    height = int(original_rgb.shape[0] * scale)\n",
    "    dim = (width, height)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.resize(original_rgb, dim, interpolation=cv2.INTER_AREA)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "    with msg_out:\n",
    "        msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "        print(f'Resized to: {processed_rgb.shape[1]}x{processed_rgb.shape[0]}')\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",

   "metadata": {

    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_rotation_change(change):\n",
    "    angle = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    if angle == 90:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_CLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    elif angle == 180:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_180)\n",
    "    elif angle == 270:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_COUNTERCLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    else:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "browse_button = widgets.Button(description='Browse Image')\n",
    "grayscale_button = widgets.Button(description='Convert to Grayscale')\n",
    "brightness_slider = widgets.IntSlider(description='Brightness', min=-100, max=100, value=0)\n",
    "resize_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Resize', options=[1.0, 0.75, 0.5], value=1.0)\n",
    "rotation_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Rotation', options=[0, 90, 180, 270], value=0)\n",
    "plot_histogram_button = widgets.Button(description='Plot Histogram')\n",
    "save_button = widgets.Button(description='Save Image')\n",
    "\n",
    "browse_button.on_click(on_browse_image_clicked)\n",
    "grayscale_button.on_click(on_grayscale_clicked)\n",
    "brightness_slider.observe(on_brightness_change, names='value')\n",
    "resize_dropdown.observe(on_resize_change, names='value')\n",
    "rotation_dropdown.observe(on_rotation_change, names='value')\n",
    "plot_histogram_button.on_click(on_plot_histogram_clicked)\n",
    "save_button.on_click(on_save_image_clicked)\n",
    "\n",
    "controls = widgets.VBox([browse_button, grayscale_button, brightness_slider, resize_dropdown, rotation_dropdown, plot_histogram_button, save_button])\n",
    "right_side = widgets.VBox([img_out, hist_out])\n",
    "ui = widgets.HBox([controls, right_side])\n",
    "\n",
    "display(msg_out, ui)\n",
    "with msg_out:\n",
    "    print('Please click Browse Image to start.')\n"
   ]
  }

    "# Interactive Image Processing Application\n",
    "\n",
    "This notebook guides you through building an interactive image processing application using OpenCV, Matplotlib, and ipywidgets. You will create a user interface with controls to manipulate images and visualize the results."

   "source": [
    "# Import necessary libraries\n",
    "import cv2\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "from matplotlib import pyplot as plt\n",
    "import ipywidgets as widgets\n",
    "from IPython.display import display\n",
    "import os\n",
    "\n",
    "# Initialize global variables\n",
    "original_bgr, original_rgb, processed_rgb = None, None, None\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create output directories\n",
    "output_path = './outputs/'\n",
    "os.makedirs(output_path, exist_ok=True)\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create widget output areas\n",
    "msg_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "img_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "hist_out = widgets.Output()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.158024Z",
     "iopub.status.busy": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.157661Z",
     "iopub.status.idle": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.162301Z",
     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.161667Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb):\n",
    "    with img_out:\n",
    "        img_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        fig, axes = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(10, 5))\n",
    "        axes[0].imshow(original_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[0].set_title('Original Image')\n",
    "        axes[1].imshow(processed_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[1].set_title('Processed Image')\n",
    "        for ax in axes:\n",
    "            ax.axis('off')\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.164447Z",
     "iopub.status.busy": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.164022Z",
     "iopub.status.idle": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.168096Z",
     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.167463Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def show_histogram(processed_rgb):\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(processed_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    hist = cv2.calcHist([gray], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])\n",
    "    with hist_out:\n",
    "        hist_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        plt.figure(figsize=(5, 3))\n",
    "        plt.title('Histogram')\n",
    "        plt.plot(hist, color='black')\n",
    "        plt.xlim([0, 256])\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Callback Functions\n",
    "Implement the callback functions for each control."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.169799Z",
     "iopub.status.busy": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.169632Z",
     "iopub.status.idle": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.173023Z",
     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.172469Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_browse_image_clicked(b):\n",
    "    from google.colab import files\n",
    "    uploaded = files.upload()\n",
    "    for filename in uploaded.keys():\n",
    "        original_bgr = cv2.imread(filename)\n",
    "        if original_bgr is not None:\n",
    "            global original_rgb, processed_rgb\n",
    "            original_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(original_bgr, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB)\n",
    "            processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "            show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "            with msg_out:\n",
    "                msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "                print(f'Loaded image: {filename}')\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.174638Z",
     "iopub.status.busy": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.174472Z",
     "iopub.status.idle": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.177268Z",
     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.176683Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_grayscale_clicked(b):\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(original_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(gray, cv2.COLOR_GRAY2RGB)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.179170Z",

     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.181133Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_brightness_change(change):\n",
    "    value = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.convertScaleAbs(original_rgb, alpha=1, beta=value)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.183711Z",

     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.186243Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_resize_change(change):\n",
    "    scale = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    width = int(original_rgb.shape[1] * scale)\n",
    "    height = int(original_rgb.shape[0] * scale)\n",
    "    dim = (width, height)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.resize(original_rgb, dim, interpolation=cv2.INTER_AREA)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "    with msg_out:\n",
    "        msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "        print(f'Resized to: {processed_rgb.shape[1]}x{processed_rgb.shape[0]}')\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.188490Z",

     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:23.190972Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_rotation_change(change):\n",
    "    angle = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    if angle == 90:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_CLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    elif angle == 180:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_180)\n",
    "    elif angle == 270:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_COUNTERCLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    else:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]
  },

    "    show_histogram(processed_rgb)\n"

    "def on_save_image_clicked(b):\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    output_filename = os.path.join(output_path, 'processed_image.jpg')\n",
    "    processed_bgr = cv2.cvtColor(processed_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2BGR)\n",
    "    cv2.imwrite(output_filename, processed_bgr)\n",
    "    with msg_out:\n",
    "        msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "        print(f'Saved image to: {output_filename}')\n"
   ]

   "source": [
    "browse_button = widgets.Button(description='Browse Image')\n",
    "grayscale_button = widgets.Button(description='Convert to Grayscale')\n",
    "brightness_slider = widgets.IntSlider(description='Brightness', min=-100, max=100, value=0)\n",
    "resize_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Resize', options=[1.0, 0.75, 0.5], value=1.0)\n",
    "rotation_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Rotation', options=[0, 90, 180, 270], value=0)\n",
    "plot_histogram_button = widgets.Button(description='Plot Histogram')\n",
    "save_button = widgets.Button(description='Save Image')\n",
    "\n",
    "browse_button.on_click(on_browse_image_clicked)\n",
    "grayscale_button.on_click(on_grayscale_clicked)\n",
    "brightness_slider.observe(on_brightness_change, names='value')\n",
    "resize_dropdown.observe(on_resize_change, names='value')\n",
    "rotation_dropdown.observe(on_rotation_change, names='value')\n",
    "plot_histogram_button.on_click(on_plot_histogram_clicked)\n",
    "save_button.on_click(on_save_image_clicked)\n",
    "\n",
    "controls = widgets.VBox([browse_button, grayscale_button, brightness_slider, resize_dropdown, rotation_dropdown, plot_histogram_button, save_button])\n",
    "right_side = widgets.VBox([img_out, hist_out])\n",
    "ui = widgets.HBox([controls, right_side])\n",
    "\n",
    "display(msg_out, ui)\n",
    "with msg_out:\n",
    "    print('Please click Browse Image to start.')\n"
   ]
  }

    "# Import necessary libraries\n",
    "import cv2\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "from matplotlib import pyplot as plt\n",
    "import ipywidgets as widgets\n",
    "from IPython.display import display\n",
    "import os\n",
    "\n",
    "# Initialize global variables\n",
    "original_bgr, original_rgb, processed_rgb = None, None, None\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create output directories\n",
    "output_path = './outputs/'\n",
    "os.makedirs(output_path, exist_ok=True)\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create widget output areas\n",
    "msg_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "img_out = widgets.Output()\n",
    "hist_out = widgets.Output()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:27.673633Z",
     "iopub.status.busy": "2026-02-28T18:05:27.672913Z",
     "iopub.status.idle": "2026-02-28T18:05:27.677085Z",
     "shell.execute_reply": "2026-02-28T18:05:27.676727Z"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb):\n",
    "    with img_out:\n",
    "        img_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        fig, axes = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(10, 5))\n",
    "        axes[0].imshow(original_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[0].set_title('Original Image')\n",
    "        axes[1].imshow(processed_rgb)\n",
    "        axes[1].set_title('Processed Image')\n",
    "        for ax in axes:\n",
    "            ax.axis('off')\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:27.679487Z",

    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def show_histogram(processed_rgb):\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(processed_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    hist = cv2.calcHist([gray], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])\n",
    "    with hist_out:\n",
    "        hist_out.clear_output(wait=True)\n",
    "        plt.figure(figsize=(5, 3))\n",
    "        plt.title('Histogram')\n",
    "        plt.plot(hist, color='black')\n",
    "        plt.xlim([0, 256])\n",
    "        plt.show()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Callback Functions\n",
    "Implement the callback functions for each control."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "metadata": {
    "execution": {
     "iopub.execute_input": "2026-02-28T18:05:27.684934Z",

    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_browse_image_clicked(b):\n",
    "    from google.colab import files\n",
    "    uploaded = files.upload()\n",
    "    for filename in uploaded.keys():\n",
    "        original_bgr = cv2.imread(filename)\n",
    "        if original_bgr is not None:\n",
    "            global original_rgb, processed_rgb\n",
    "            original_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(original_bgr, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB)\n",
    "            processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "            show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "            with msg_out:\n",
    "                msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "                print(f'Loaded image: {filename}')\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",

   "metadata": {

   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_grayscale_clicked(b):\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    gray = cv2.cvtColor(original_rgb, cv2.COLOR_RGB2GRAY)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.cvtColor(gray, cv2.COLOR_GRAY2RGB)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]

    "def on_brightness_change(change):\n",
    "    value = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.convertScaleAbs(original_rgb, alpha=1, beta=value)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]
  },

    "def on_resize_change(change):\n",
    "    scale = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    width = int(original_rgb.shape[1] * scale)\n",
    "    height = int(original_rgb.shape[0] * scale)\n",
    "    dim = (width, height)\n",
    "    processed_rgb = cv2.resize(original_rgb, dim, interpolation=cv2.INTER_AREA)\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n",
    "    with msg_out:\n",
    "        msg_out.clear_output()\n",
    "        print(f'Resized to: {processed_rgb.shape[1]}x{processed_rgb.shape[0]}')\n"
   ]

   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def on_rotation_change(change):\n",
    "    angle = change['new']\n",
    "    global processed_rgb\n",
    "    if angle == 90:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_CLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    elif angle == 180:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_180)\n",
    "    elif angle == 270:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = cv2.rotate(original_rgb, cv2.ROTATE_90_COUNTERCLOCKWISE)\n",
    "    else:\n",
    "        processed_rgb = original_rgb.copy()\n",
    "    show_images(original_rgb, processed_rgb)\n"
   ]

    "brightness_slider = widgets.IntSlider(description='Brightness', min=-100, max=100, value=0)\n",
    "resize_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Resize', options=[1.0, 0.75, 0.5], value=1.0)\n",
    "rotation_dropdown = widgets.Dropdown(description='Rotation', options=[0, 90, 180, 270], value=0)\n",
    "plot_histogram_button = widgets.Button(description='Plot Histogram')\n",
    "save_button = widgets.Button(description='Save Image')\n",
    "\n",
    "browse_button.on_click(on_browse_image_clicked)\n",
    "grayscale_button.on_click(on_grayscale_clicked)\n",
    "brightness_slider.observe(on_brightness_change, names='value')\n",
    "resize_dropdown.observe(on_resize_change, names='value')\n",
    "rotation_dropdown.observe(on_rotation_change, names='value')\n",
    "plot_histogram_button.on_click(on_plot_histogram_clicked)\n",
    "save_button.on_click(on_save_image_clicked)\n",
    "\n",
    "controls = widgets.VBox([browse_button, grayscale_button, brightness_slider, resize_dropdown, rotation_dropdown, plot_histogram_button, save_button])\n",
    "right_side = widgets.VBox([img_out, hist_out])\n",
    "ui = widgets.HBox([controls, right_side])\n",
    "\n",
    "display(msg_out, ui)\n",
    "with msg_out:\n",
    "    print('Please click Browse Image to start.')\n"
   ]
  }
 ],
